titles.title: To designate the Pittsburgh Aviary in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania as the National Aviary in Pittsburgh.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E345)
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources Discharged.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. H. Rept. 103-169.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 65.

action.text: Mr. Studds moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Baucus without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 235.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Designates the Pittsburgh Aviary in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, as the National Aviary in Pittsburgh.
